charges.charge_description: 18 U.S.C. 13 assimilating 1950 Code of Va., as amended, 18.2-266 and 18.2-270 et seq - Operate motor vehicle under the influence of marijuana(1)

charges.charge_disposition: SENTENCE: Imprisonment seventy (70) days; Supervised Release twelve (12) months; Fine, $250.00, Special Assessment, $25.00.

charges.charge_description: 18 U.S.C. 13 assimilating 1950 Code of Va., as amended, 46.2-301 - Suspended License, 5th offense(2)

charges.charge_disposition: SENTENCE: Imprisonment seventy (70) days. Supervised Release twelve (12) months;No fine, Special Assessment, $25.00. License suspended for one year;ASAP

charges.charge_description: 32 C.F.R. Section 634.25(f) assimilating 1950 Code of Va., as amended, 46.2-804 - Fail to stay within one lane(3)
